title: Sooo uhh whats this? I'm not the only one getting it.
body:
Error message, just after logging on, and it wont connect me to chat.

i know my friend (on a different internet) is having the same problem, anyone else?

replies.body: they are aware of it ad looking into it. riot commented on the other thread

Hey folks

We're looking into it now.

cheers!
Mindstar
this happened like a week ago too
its patch 6.9 the game doesnt agree with it and is also trying to revolt
This crap just made me dodge a ranked game while in promos resulting in a loss..

That sucks!

Can you explain in a bit more detail what happened?   Did you have to dodge because you were unable to chat to team? Or did champ select fail somehow and kick you out?

Mindstar
I Had selected Annie the initial pick phase and when it came my turn to confirm my pick it wouldn't lock in counted down to zero and booted me.
It counted it as a loss and took 10 LP
Hmm.. based on the issue at hand it doesn't sound too related.  Have you had problems like this in the past with champ select not locking in properly?

never happened before - If the client has disconnected from PVP.net wouldn't this cause it to not allow me to lock-in the champion since it can't communicate with the riot servers? As soon as it kicked me I got the Disconnect message. Definitely riot side. I had music playing through youtube at the time that was not affected.

So your telling me that this happen "coincidentally" when riot is having problems with its servers. What a joke.

If you saw a "Disconnected from PVP.NET" then what you saw would be totally expected.  In this case, not directly related to the chat issues though, as that would not have affected champ select or your ability to connect to PVP.net.

Based on your description,  it is most likely that you encountered some kind of routing or ISP related issue between your PC and the LoL server.
When do u think it will be back up?
I was getting it a lot recently as well, whenever I go into a new place, like creating a ranked game, or going into the shop.

Get this frequently, doesn't interfere with anything, i just click close and everything works fine, even if it does pop up 3-4 times. Doesn't really affect much and i still connected, never have to relog
It's a nuisance for sure, but other than popping up it doesn't affect the game at all
It's a riot customer support advertisement.

@Agent Mindstar I have gotten this message from logging in 3 times (twice on one account and once on other account). It did this after I finished a ARAm about 39 minutes ago. But me and my friend both relogged twice (i exited non main and logged into main x 2) but we even though we could NOT see each other on friends lists or etc, he could invite me using a manual name invite to game. We could not talk to anyone during que screen, we could chat IN the game though. But once we won (which was weird because it was a normal and we had to pick champs etc based on what team champs were and their summoner abilities). It seems that the server is intact, but the chat from the NON in game client is not available. IN chat game is working though. Not sure if this helps but hopefully it does :)
same here
same issue in NZ so its definitely a server-side issue
yeah same problem here too - looks like its crashed - adelaide SA
Just left a comment about the same thing in another thread. Can't connect to chat either, so something on Riot's end most likely.
same problem cant connect to chat cant invite or be invited to games.
same problem. iinet rockingham WA
Just logged in and also received this error and cannot connect to chat, Telstra cable in Melbourne.
Yeah same thing here
